description: SIX & GUELPH is a boutique four-home collection in one of Mount Pleasant’s most sought-after pockets—just minutes to Main Street, Downtown, and Olympic Village. This bright corner residence offers nearly 1,500 sq ft with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and three private outdoor spaces. The main level features an airy open-concept layout with oversized windows, flooding the home with natural light. The chef-inspired kitchen includes premium stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and access to a deck ideal for BBQs. The mid-level hosts two bedrooms, a full bath, and laundry. The top-floor primary retreat features a walk-in closet, spa-style ensuite, and two decks, including a stunning view deck. The lower level adds flexibility with a large den, full bath, & garage. Open House cancelled
